verbs.description: [ARG0: Rudy Giuliani] [V: suggested] [ARG1: that Donald Trump plans to pull the U.S. out of the Iran nuclear agreement] , [ARGM-ADV: pointing to the presence in the president ’s inner circle of new Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and long - time foreign policy hawk John Bolton] .

Rudy Giuliani suggested that [ARG0: Donald Trump] plans to [V: pull] [ARG1: the U.S.] [ARG2: out of the Iran nuclear agreement] , pointing to the presence in the president ’s inner circle of new Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and long - time foreign policy hawk John Bolton .

[ARG0: Rudy Giuliani] suggested that Donald Trump plans to pull the U.S. out of the Iran nuclear agreement , [V: pointing] [ARG2: to the presence in the president ’s inner circle of new Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and long - time foreign policy hawk John Bolton] .
